abilities.trigger: at the start of your turn

actions.name: Pounce
actions.desc:
Pull yourself 3 towards an enemy you can see.
Usable once per turn.

actions.name: Howl
actions.desc:
Gain 1 Power token, then heal 4, then give 1 Weakness token to each enemy you can see.
Usable once per turn.
